Title: Shopware Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
Description: Under certain circumstances, itâ€™s possible to execute an unauthorized foreign code in Shopware. This is a critical security vulnerability that could affect the entire system. All Shopware versions including Shopware 5.2.14 are affected.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.0.8, all versions starting from 4.0.0 before 5.2.15
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.0.8 before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 5.2.15
